var.name: ID
var.default: SELECT max(EVENT_ID) event_id, (select max(ili_data_id) from pods.ili_data) ili_data_id FROM PODS.EVENT_RANGE

dbCommand.query: UPDATE PODS.ILI_DATA set CERTAINTY_INTERVAL=0.01, CONTROL_POINT_LF='Y', REF_EVENT_ID=case when :REF_EVENT_ID is null then REF_EVENT_ID else :REF_EVENT_ID end, CALIBRATED_MEASURE=(select measure from pods.station_point s where s.station_id in (select e.station_id_begin from pods.event_range e where e.event_id=:REF_EVENT_ID)), ABSOLUTE_ODOMETER = :ABSOLUTE_ODOMETER WHERE ILI_DATA_ID = :ID;
UPDATE pods.ili_data SET ref_event_id=null, ref_event_guid=null, control_point_lf='N', calibrated_measure=null, certainty_interval=null WHERE ILI_DATA_ID = {ID};
